title: Table cover
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: embroidered in satin, running, couching, overcasting, and knot stitches with witdrawn element work with overcasting and inserts of needlemade lace on plain weave foundation
description: White rectangular table mat with machine-embroidered picture of a shepherd in a pastoral landscape, surrounded by floral medallions, floral garlands, and a border of needle lace.
name: Table cover
